name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3
discription: The device is an entry-level laptop that comes with a powerful AMD Ryzen 7 4700U Mobile Processor along with discrete AMD Radeon graphics options. It allows you to perform tasks with good speed and multitask without any lags.

name: Lenovo Yoga 6 13ALC6
discription: Processor AMD Ryzen 5 5500U (2.1 to 4GHz, 3MB Cache, 6C/12T) Display: 13.3 FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS, 300 nits, 72% NTSC, 10-point. multi-touch, AAR 88% Display.Memory: 16GB DDR4 RAM.Storage: 512GB NVMe SSD.Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics

name: Lenovo IdeaPad
discription: The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i powered by Intel Core i3-1005G1 Processor (4M Cache,1.20 GHz up to 3.40 GHz, 4 MB Cache, 4 Threads) with Intel UHD Graphics. This 10th Gen Intel Core processors and discrete graphics options fuel speedy performance, easy multitasking, and great entertainment experience.

name: Lenovo V310 (15)
discription: The Lenovo V310 is designed to meet all of your business needs, including budget. It's very configurable and has a range of options, from state-of-the-art processing to a flexible dual storage system. Plus, with its optional battery feature, this portable laptop can keep going for up to 12 hours.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i
discription: The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i 15IGL comes with Intel Celeron N4020 (4M Cache, 1.10 GHz up to 2.80 GHz) and 4GB DDR4 2400MHz RAM. It also comes with a 1TB 5400rpm 2.5 HDD to store all your important data. It is integrated with Integrated Intel UHD Graphics 600 and it has a 15.6 HD

name: IdeaPad 5i
discription: The IdeaPad 5i (15) Intel boasts an enticing list of included and optional features, making it a powerful combination of performance, connectivity, and entertainment with up to 10th Gen Intel® Core™ i7 processing. Enjoy crisp visuals on the 15 FHD display along with the rich sound of user-facing, Dolby Audio™-tuned speakers.
